mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (PRODSEQ, SELLERSEQ, CATEGORY, PRODNAME, PRODINFO, PRICE, DISCOUNT, SHIPPINGCHARGE, STOCKNUMBER, PHOTOURL) VALUES (PRODSEQ.nextval, #{sellerSeq}, #{category}, #{prodName}, #{prodInfo}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{shippingCharge}, #{stockNumber}, #{photoUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, PRODSEQ, SELLERSEQ, CATEGORY, PRODNAME, PRODINFO, PRICE, DISCOUNT, SHIPPINGCHARGE, STOCKNUMBER, PHOTOURL FROM PRODUCT) )
